com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.model

Interface Configured

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ResourceTemplate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComputeProvider, AbstractConfigured, AbstractDatabaseServerProvider, AbstractInstanceProvider, AbstractResourceProvider, ComputeInstanceTemplate, ComputeProviderAdapter.ComputeInstanceTemplateWrapper, DatabaseServerInstanceTemplate, DatabaseServerProviderAdapter.DatabaseServerInstanceTemplateWrapper, InstanceTemplate, SimpleConfiguration, SimpleResourceTemplate

    public interface Configured
    Represents a configured object that can report its configuration parameter values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,String> getConfiguration(LocalizationContext localizationContext)
      Returns the unmodifiable map of configuration parameter values.
      String getConfigurationValue(ConfigurationProperty property, LocalizationContext localizationContext)
      Returns the value of the specified configuration property, or the default value if the value is not present and the configuration property is optional.
      String getConfigurationValue(ConfigurationPropertyToken token, LocalizationContext localizationContext)
      Returns the value of the specified configuration property, or the default value if the value is not present and the configuration property is optional.

    • Method Detail

        Returns the unmodifiable map of configuration parameter values.

        Returns:
        the unmodifiable map of configuration parameter values

      • getConfigurationValue

        String getConfigurationValue(ConfigurationPropertyToken token,
                             LocalizationContext localizationContext)
        Returns the value of the specified configuration property, or the default value if the value is not present and the configuration property is optional.
        Parameters:
        token - the configuration property token
        localizationContext - the localization context
        Returns:
        the value of the specified configuration property, or the default value if the value is not present and the configuration property is optional
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified configuration property is not present and required
